name: 05-IlikeThis
description: This is great or I like this! Use this to motivate people. Don’t overuse it, but certainly point out if you like something.

name: 10-Ajustements
code: I think this needs to be ajusted...
description: This is a concern or suggested change/refactor that I feel is worth addressing. This is a well-meant suggestion. Take it or leave it.

name: 15-Question
code: I have a question on ... / can you clarify?
description: This should be a fully formed question with sufficient information and context that requires a response.

name: 20-Suggestion
code: I have a suggestion or might express on concern on...
description: I might express concern, suggest an alternative solution, or walk through the code in my own words to make sure I understand.

name: 25-Nitpick
description: This is a nitpick. Normally related to a small formatting or stylizing detail that shouldn’t block moving forward.

name: 30-Problem
description: I’m a bit nervous about this change and what it might introduce after merging, and would like to better understand why it is needed. It might be a bug or a strict code style fix.

name: 35-ProblemNotInYourWork
code: Here is a problem independent from your work
description: It would be nice if we would open up a ticket and discuss about that. Or is an opportunity, not directly related to your changes, for us to leave the campground [code] cleaner than we found it.

name: 40-Refactoring
description: Should include enough context to be actionable and not be considered a nitpick.

name: 45-OutOfScope
description: This is a concern that is out of scope and should be staged appropriately for follow up.

name: 50-FutureElement
description: An observation or suggestion that is not a change request, but may have larger implications. Generally something to keep in mind for the future.

name: 55-Note
description: This is an explanatory note, fun fact, or relevant commentary that does not require any action.
